title: Harnessing lattice oxygens in a high-entropy perovskite oxide for enhanced oxygen evolution reaction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01204F, Paper
Sujan Sen, Tapas Kumar Mandal
A high-entropy perovskite electrocatalyst, Ba0.33Sr0.67Co0.33Ti0.165Ru0.165Sb0.33O3, obtained by incorporating a small amount of Ru, reveals excellent intrinsic OER activity and high stability despite enhanced lattice oxygen participation.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
